鯼鯼鯼
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

鯼字的基本解释

鯼
zōng
石首鱼，即“黄鱼”。
古同“鯮”。

鯼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
［《廣韻》作弄切，去送，精。］
亦作“鯮1”。
(1)石首鱼。
(2)名鸭嘴鯮、尖头鱤。鱼纲鲤科。体呈亚圆筒形，头前部细长成管状，吻平扁略似鸭嘴，鳞细小，青黄色，生活在江河湖泊中。

鯼字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鯼； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1474第05
【廣韻】子紅切【集韻】祖叢切，?音㚇。【博雅】石首鯼也。【郭璞·江賦】鯼鮆順時而往還。【註】鯼魚出南海，頭中有石，一名石首魚。【正字通】鯼魚體員厚而長，似鱤魚，腹稍起，扁額長喙，細鱗腹白，背微黃色，性好噉魚。諸書皆以爲石首，非也。

鯼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鯼字的起名意思

暂无。

Flying
Basic explanation of words
Flying
zōng
Stone head fish, namely "Yellow croaker".
Ancient with "鯮".
Flying
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
["Guangyun" makes tricks and cuts, go to send, fine. ]
Also known as "鯮1".
(1) Shitou.
(2) The famous duck-billed duck and pointed 鱤. Fish class Cyprinidae. The body is sub-cylindrical, the front of the head is slender and tubular, the snout is flat and slightly like a duck's bill, the scales are small, blue-yellow, and it lives in rivers and lakes.
Flying
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鯼; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1474 No. 05
[Guang Yun] Zihong cut [Ji Yun] Zu Cong cut,? Yin 㚇. [Bo Ya] Shishou Shuya. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Flyers return from time to time. [Note] Flying flying fish out of the South China Sea, there is a stone in the head, a stone head fish. 【Zhengzitong】The flying fish has a thick and long body, resembling a fish, with a slightly raised belly, a flat forehead, a long beak, fine scales, a white belly, a slightly yellow back, and good sex. All books think that the head of the stone is not the case.
Flying

zōng
